subject: Football
Bowl Games
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: After dropping out of the Associated Press top 25 for the first time in eight years, U.S.C. accepted a bid to play Boston College in the Emerald Bowl.
snippet: After dropping out of the Associated Press top 25 for the first time in eight years, U.S.C. accepted a bid to play Boston College in the Emerald Bowl.
